entry.value: qz_number = session.getQueueSize().getObjectCount() if qz_number == 4: session.remove(session.get(qz_number)) session.transfer(session.create(), REL_SUCCESS)

select s.salesorderid as salesorder_id ,s.customerid as customer_id ,c.storeid as store_id ,s.salespersonid as salesperson_id ,s.shiptoaddressid as shiptoaddress_id ,a.ship_to_address ,st."name" as store_name ,s.orderdate as order_date ,s.shipdate as ship_date ,s.duedate as due_date ,s.status as order_status ,s.subtotal as sales_subtotal from dm_stg.salesorderheader_si s left join dm_stg.customer_si c on s.customerid = c.customerid left join dm_stg.store_si st on c.storeid = st.businessentityid left join dm_stg.address_si a on s.shiptoaddressid = a.addressid
select a.addressid, concat(a.addressline1, ', ', a.city) as ship_to_address from person.address a

select s.salesorderid ,s.customerid ,s.salespersonid ,s.shiptoaddressid ,cast(s.orderdate as date) ,cast(s.shipdate as date) ,cast(s.duedate as date) ,case when s.status = 1 then 'In progress' when s.status = 2 then 'Approved' when s.status = 3 then 'Backordered' when s.status = 4 then 'Rejected' when s.status = 5 then 'Shipped' when s.status = 6 then 'Canceled' else 'Unknown' end as status ,s.subtotal from sales.salesorderheader s
